comment.author: 51303352@N07
comment._content: The date is Apr46. Webster is not in the band. Add Jimmy Hamilton and Al Sears. Hodges is identified. Hardwicke and Carney are correctly identified. This was the rest of the band: Taft Jordan, Shelton Hemphill, Cat Anderson, Francis Williams, Reunald Jones, Ray Nance; Joe Nanton, Wilbur De Paris, Lawrence Brown, Claude Jones; Fred Guy, Oscar Pettiford, Sonny Greer

comment.author: 13024036@N07
comment._content: Claude Jones is wrongly identified as Juan Tizol.
